nodes.text: Snorbals were grazing herd animals from the planet Lok. They were found among the arid wastelands of their homeworlds. Snorbal were highly intelligent and docile creatures, rarely attacking other than to defend their herd. Their trunk had two 'fingers' at the end, allowing them to manipulate simple objects. Snorbal had a highly efficient digestive system. The Snorbals were physically very similar to the thunes of Dantooine.

Snorbals appeared in the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
